Text: Lupin the Third: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine (LUPIN the Third -峰不二子という女- , Rupan za Saado Mine Fujiko to Iu Onna ) is the fourth incarnation of TMS Entertainment's long-running anime television adaptation of the "Lupin III" manga series written by Monkey Punch.

1: Lupin the Third: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine

<Text: Lupin the Third: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine:  Directed by Sayo Yamamoto, it aired on NTV from April 4, 2012 to June 27, 2012.>
